categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a battle was waged aboard the Harrower-class dreadnought Voidstar. The technologically-advanced vessel had gone missing during the Great Galactic War years prior, only to be rediscovered during the Cold War by both factions. The now-derelict ship contained the schematics for a prototype superweapon—a prize sought after by both the Republic and the Sith Empire.

An Imperial strike team under the command of Dark Council member Darth Marr soon arrived in a Gage-class transport and boarded the vessel in an Imperial assault shuttle to acquire the schematics, but a Thranta-class corvette soon arrived carrying a Republic team led by Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan, which boarded the vessel in a Rendaran-class assault shuttle and intercepted the Sith Empire's strike team.
